summaries.brief_summary: New admin command, 2.3.0-beta2 release, and comprehensive documentation improvements delivered this week
summaries.new_features_summary: New `opam admin compare-versions` command and expanded platform support with RISC-V and NetBSD binaries
summaries.new_features:
- New **admin command** `opam admin compare-versions` for package version comparison with operator flags (--lt, --gt, --eq) and detailed usage examples ([#6197](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6197))
- **RISC-V support** added to pre-compiled binary distribution for Linux/riscv64 platform ([2a5776](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/commit/2a57765a0b0031c8319fcc16becc7d3c4f64f833))
- **NetBSD support** expanded with x86_64 binary builds in release script ([e65e47](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/commit/e65e47feba4c2d1faca7252ba2a36a681790cd92))
- **Version BNF definition** simplified by removing redundant '+' character from grammar ([a3c6ec](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/commit/a3c6ec9c8ff48155e79cfa0328f61e81d6fb65fa))
- **CLI version 2.4** support added for upcoming release compatibility ([ab1bdb](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/commit/ab1bdb985f0a73e3965d95f93824d6f7bd833a2f))
- **Release documentation** restructured with separate Windows setup guide and improved reliability procedures ([cf199a](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/commit/cf199a32ad6b8f98700f21be8186d782ebb49828))
- **MLI documentation** enhancements with fixed code blocks, added `@raise` tags, and exported `OpamProcess` functions ([538bc4](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/commit/538bc44699282630d565af3179544be00d38da88))
summaries.activity_summary: One new PR opened for deprecated file format cleanup while multiple maintenance and documentation improvements were merged
summaries.activity:

summaries.trends_summary: Focus on release infrastructure modernization and platform expansion for broader OCaml ecosystem reach
summaries.emerging_trends:
- **Platform expansion** with RISC-V and NetBSD binary support indicating commitment to broader hardware architectures
- **Release automation** improvements through upgraded build environments and simplified processes for more reliable releases
- **API modernization** through new administrative commands and CLI version support for upcoming 2.4 release
- **Documentation quality** enhancements with systematic MLI improvements and clearer user-facing examples

summaries.contributors:

summaries.brief_summary: Release of opam 2.3.0~beta1 with bug fixes, improved Windows support, and enhanced release infrastructure
summaries.new_features_summary: First beta release of opam 2.3.0 with bug fixes and platform improvements across Linux, Windows, macOS, FreeBSD and OpenBSD
summaries.new_features:
- **Release of opam 2.3.0~beta1** with comprehensive bug fixes and platform support improvements ([2.3.0-beta1](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/releases/tag/2.3.0-beta1))
- Fixed **VCS pinning regression** that stored untracked files in local VCS directories, resolving git submodule issues ([#6221](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6221))
- Fixed **platform compatibility** crash on OpenBSD where `getconf LONG_BIT` is unavailable ([#6230](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6230))
- Fixed **package cache corruption** storing wrong opam file versions after build failures ([#6213](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6213))
- Fixed **lint regression** W59 with local URLs that aren't archives ([#6219](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6219))
- **Enhanced Windows support** with fixes for OCaml 5.0+ compilation ([#6216](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/issues/6216))
- **Improved release infrastructure** including RISC-V Linux binary support and FreeBSD 14.1/OpenBSD 7.6 upgrades ([c7a1d9fc](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/commit/c7a1d9fc0605f907ada31e165779995273dd5477), [7a78925110](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/commit/7a78925110e0a6e005fc2c087d2fd0c7edf79a1a))
- **Updated install scripts** with 2.3.0~beta1 binary checksums for all supported platforms ([b600f1e88](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/commit/b600f1e88f779db90fd2f57e911b749449e510f4))
- **New documentation CI job** added to GitHub Actions for automated doc generation and validation ([f48edffd](https://github.com/ocaml/opam/commit/f48edffd118e8e50e8211a199c559c77162e1318))
